name: Syncopation (Travis D. Hill)
description:
Made possible by Patreon.
You can get a physical copy here.

Syncopation is a 1-12 player game where players collaboratively create the background, story, and future of a jazz band in one of the Big Eras of Jazz. Form your group, record an album, get signed, and go on tour in this short, 30-minute storytelling RPG.

Using some dice and a deck of cards, players designate dice to specific areas to see how great or poor your success is! Then, you collaboratively talk about it.

Syncopation is a one-page game that requires D6 and cards.
